units.name: Watcher
units.prompt: Scan priority targets each turn to reveal their strategy. Use recalibrate on your damage dealer to boost effectiveness. Stay behind allies and maintain range. Never get adjacent to enemy vectors.

units.name: Bastion
units.prompt: Advance toward the nearest enemy. Use shield_wall facing the direction with the most enemies. If an enemy is adjacent, attack them.

units.name: Deadeye
units.prompt: Maintain distance. Use precision_shot on high-value targets â€” medics first, then damage dealers. Use suppressing_fire if enemies close in.

player.placementPrompt: Cluster near the center for mutual support. Front-liner forward, others one row back.

units.name: Wraith
units.prompt: Cloak and move behind enemy lines. Target isolated enemies with shadow_strike. Save breach for the most dangerous enemy. Avoid being caught uncloaked.

units.name: Lattice
units.prompt: Trap the paths enemies must take to reach your backline. Stay at medium range. Use pulse on clustered enemies. Denial blocks adjacent threats.

units.name: Insight
units.prompt: Scan early to give your team intel on enemy prompts. Target enemy specters with scan to track them after cloak. Use recalibrate on allies who need tactical adjustments. Stay safe at range behind your front line.

opponent.placementPrompt: Place aggressive units forward on one flank. Support units behind and toward center.
